website_summaries.verdict: While it's fairly basic and not the most powerful microwave, it's a good value for small counters, apartments, dorms, kitchens, and budgets.
pros: An inexpensive model with a footprint that doesn't take up much counter space
Has express cook and six one-touch quick start options
All-black finish has a contemporary look
cons: 700 watts of power limits ability to cook some items
Condensation tends to build up inside when heating some foods

customer_reviews.title: For the Money, it's a Little Dandy!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, first of all this is a very inexpensive microwave (don't know how it can be manufactured and sold at so low a price). So for the price it is an outstanding device. Yes, with 700 watts, you have to add about 50% to your normal cooking time (versus a 1200 watt machine). Yes, maybe it's a little bit more complicated to operate, and you have to close the door a little more forcefully than you might expect to make it run. But for the money, it's a little dandy!
customer_reviews.author: Jayrbee

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as described. It's small so it doesn't take up much room. It's not overly noisy. So far, it works great (have had for a few weeks). I can't address the lack of venting or power issues mentioned on other reviews because I don't use this microwave for heating up food; I use it for heating up bean bag heating pads. And it works great for those. I would say that if you have minimal needs such as heating up a single cup o' noodle soups in dorm rooms (vs full meal for family of 4), this is perfect for those needs.

product_meta.title: Bella 700-Watt Compact Digital Microwave Oven, 0.7 cu. ft, Black
product_meta.description: Bring a touch of fun and style to your kitchen with the compact countertop microwave from Bella. This small but mighty 0.7-cubic foot microwave oven offers 700 watts of power and 10 power levels for versatile food prep. The compact model features a removable 10-inch turntable to ensure even heating for most standard-sized dinner plates. The Bella Compact microwave includes an easy to use digital interface with an LED clock and kitchen timer. One-touch cooking is at your fingertips with 1-6 minute Express Cook controls, convenient +30 second control and 6 Quick Start one-touch cooking functions for popcorn, beverage, dinner plate and more. The Bella microwave allows you to defrost by time or weight and offers multi-stage cooking that adjusts power level during the cooking cycle for greater control. Thanks to a memory-function you can save and recall custom controls. For safety, the microwave is equipped with a keypad lockout to prevent unauthorized use.
feature_bullets: Compact countertop microwave with 700 watts of power and 10 power levels
Digital control with LED clock and kitchen timer
1-6 minute Express Cook controls; +30 second control; 6 Quick Start one-touch cooking functions
Defrost by time or weight; Multi-stage cooking; Memory-function saves custom controls
10-inch removable Glass Turntable ensures even cooking
